# Prisma2MarkdownPrisma2Markdown or more is a pure python package that aim to facilitate prisma database visualization using mermaid.Unfortunately, mermaid still have an issue that prevent perfect visualization since mermaid cannot yet create attribute relations.# Installation```pip install py-prisma2markdown```or ```pip install git+https://github.com/HOZHENWAI/py-prisma2markdown.git```# UsageThis package make a command line available:```prisma2markdown ```To use the ```prisma2markdown update``` command, you have to setup your markdownwith the following script:```
[comment]: # (prisma2markdown)

[comment]: # ({TARGET_PRISMA_SCRIPT})```replacing {TARGET_PRISMA_SCRIPT} with a path to the prisma script then callingthe cli command: ```prisma update --markdown-target PATH_TO_MARKDOWN```
